short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block distracting sites and run Pomodoro sessions - as uninterrupted as possible.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Digital distractions are one of our biggest beasts to tackle today. While the Internet and the computer are great sources of education, productivity, and creation, they are also great sources of distractions in which anything you could think of is just one click away.

That’s why it’s essential to take preventative measures and eliminate these digital distractions during focus time. With the Mini Pomodoro Blocker, you can do just that!

✅ Runs focus sessions and Pomodoro sessions
✅ Times healthy breaks
✅ Blocks distracting sites and redirects your focus
✅ Allows for custom site entry 

Free vs. Pro 
The Mini Pomodoro Blocker is available for free with limited features. You can run unlimited sessions and block up to 3 distracting sites.

The Pro version is available for an affordable $5 one-time fee. By purchasing the pro version, you’ll have the Mini Pomodoro Blocker without any limits and access to future features like metrics and tagging. Thank you so much for your time and your consideration. 

Have any questions or feedback? Feel free to email me at allison.thesidekickapp@gmail.com and I'll get back to you.
